SnapshotOraclev11g.name: MV_SERVICEABILITY_FLAG
SnapshotOraclev11g.subquery:
SELECT strt_add.street_address_id,
DECODE (
MAX (
DECODE (srv.connection_status_cd, 'N', 1, 'A', 2, 'D', 3, 0)),
1, 'N',
2, 'A',
3, 'D',
NULL)
AS connection_status_cd,
MAX (srv.NODE_NM) AS NODE_NM,
MAX (DECODE (b.product_summary_cd, 'ANA_FLAG', 1, 0)) ana_flag,
MAX (DECODE (b.product_summary_cd, 'DIG_FLAG', 1, 0)) dig_flag,
MAX (DECODE (b.product_summary_cd, 'HSD_FLAG', 1, 0)) hsd_flag,
MAX (DECODE (b.product_summary_cd, 'VOD_FLAG', 1, 0)) vod_flag,
MAX (DECODE (b.product_summary_cd, 'HDTV_FLAG', 1, 0)) hdtv_flag,
MAX (DECODE (b.product_summary_cd, 'DVR_FLAG', 1, 0)) dvr_flag,
MAX (DECODE (b.product_summary_cd, 'TEL_FLAG', 1, 0)) tel_flag
FROM chtr.t_street_address strt_add
INNER JOIN chtr.t_serviceability_prd_ref_cd b
ON (strt_add.serviceability_cd = b.serviceability_cd
AND b.data_source_type_cd = strt_add.data_source_type_cd)
INNER JOIN chtr.t_street_address_servicability srv
ON (strt_add.street_address_id = srv.street_address_id)
GROUP BY strt_add.street_address_id
